020
021import net.kyori.adventure.text.Component;
022import net.tnemc.core.menu.handlers.AmountSelectionHandler;
023import net.tnemc.core.menu.icons.actions.PageSwitchWithClose;
024import net.tnemc.menu.core.builder.IconBuilder;
025import net.tnemc.menu.core.callbacks.page.PageOpenCallback;
026import net.tnemc.menu.core.handlers.MenuClickHandler;
027import net.tnemc.menu.core.icon.action.impl.ChatAction;
028import net.tnemc.menu.core.icon.action.impl.RunnableAction;
029import net.tnemc.menu.core.icon.action.impl.SwitchPageAction;
030import net.tnemc.menu.core.viewer.MenuViewer;
031import net.tnemc.plugincore.PluginCore;
032import net.tnemc.plugincore.core.io.message.MessageData;
033import net.tnemc.plugincore.core.io.message.MessageHandler;
034
035import java.math.BigDecimal;
036import java.util.Collections;
037import java.util.Optional;
038import java.util.UUID;
039import java.util.function.Consumer;
040
041/**
042 * AmountSelectionPage
043 *
044 * @author creatorfromhell
045 * @since 0.1.3.0
046 */
047public class AmountSelectionPage {
048
049  protected final String returnMenu;
050  protected final String menuName;
051  protected final int menuPage;
052  protected final int returnPage;
053  protected final String amtID;
054
055  protected final Consumer<AmountSelectionHandler> selectionListener;
056
057  public AmountSelectionPage(final String amtID, final String returnMenu, final String menuName,
058                             final int menuPage, final int returnPage, final Consumer<AmountSelectionHandler> selectionListener) {
059
060    this.returnMenu = returnMenu;
061    this.menuName = menuName;
062    this.menuPage = menuPage;
063    this.returnPage = returnPage;
064    this.amtID = amtID;
065    this.selectionListener = selectionListener;
066  }
067
068  public void handle(final PageOpenCallback callback) {
069
070    final Optional<MenuViewer> viewer = callback.getPlayer().viewer();
071    if(viewer.isPresent()) {
072
073      final UUID id = viewer.get().uuid();
074
075      callback.getPage().addIcon(new IconBuilder(PluginCore.server().stackBuilder().of("BARRIER", 1)
076                                                         .customName(MessageHandler.grab(new MessageData("Messages.Menu.Shared.EscapeDisplay"), id))
077                                                         .lore(Collections.singletonList(MessageHandler.grab(new MessageData("Messages.Menu.Shared.Escape"), id))))
078                                         .withActions(new PageSwitchWithClose(returnMenu, returnPage))
079                                         .withSlot(0)
080                                         .build());
081
082      callback.getPage().addIcon(new IconBuilder(PluginCore.server().stackBuilder().of("GREEN_WOOL", 1)
083                                                         .customName(MessageHandler.grab(new MessageData("Messages.Menu.Shared.Save"), id))
084                                                         .lore(Collections.singletonList(MessageHandler.grab(new MessageData("Messages.Menu.AmountSelect.Save"), id))))
085                                         .withActions(new RunnableAction((click)->{
086                                           if(selectionListener != null) {
087
088                                             selectionListener.accept(new AmountSelectionHandler(click, ((BigDecimal)viewer.get().dataOrDefault(amtID, BigDecimal.ZERO))));
089                                           }
090                                         }), new PageSwitchWithClose(returnMenu, returnPage))
091                                         .withSlot(8)
092                                         .build());
093
094      callback.getPage().addIcon(new IconBuilder(PluginCore.server().stackBuilder().of("ARROW", 1)
095                                                         .customName(MessageHandler.grab(new MessageData("Messages.Menu.MyEco.Format.OwnDisplay"), id))
096                                                         .lore(Collections.singletonList(MessageHandler.grab(new MessageData("Messages.Menu.AmountSelect.Enter"), id))))
097                                         .withActions(new ChatAction((message)->{
098
099
100                                           if(message.getPlayer().viewer().isPresent() && !message.getMessage().isEmpty()) {
101
102                                             try {
103
104                                               message.getPlayer().viewer().get().addData(amtID, new BigDecimal(message.getMessage()));
105                                               return true;
106                                             } catch(final NumberFormatException ignore) { }
107                                           }
108
109                                           //TODO:
110
111                                           message.getPlayer().message("Enter a valid decimal value:");
112                                           return false;
113
114                                         }), new RunnableAction((run)->run.player().message("Enter a valid decimal value:")))
115                                         .withSlot(2)
116                                         .build());
117
118      callback.getPage().addIcon(new IconBuilder(PluginCore.server().stackBuilder().of("PAPER", 1)
119                                                         .customName(Component.text(((BigDecimal)viewer.get().dataOrDefault(amtID, BigDecimal.ZERO)).toPlainString()))
120                                                         .lore(Collections.singletonList(MessageHandler.grab(new MessageData("Messages.Menu.AmountSelect.Amount"), id))))
121                                         .withActions(new SwitchPageAction(menuName, menuPage))
122                                         .withSlot(4)
123                                         .build());
124
125      callback.getPage().addIcon(new IconBuilder(PluginCore.server().stackBuilder().of("BLACK_WOOL", 1)
126                                                         .customName(MessageHandler.grab(new MessageData("Messages.Menu.AmountSelect.ResetDisplay"), id))
127                                                         .lore(Collections.singletonList(MessageHandler.grab(new MessageData("Messages.Menu.AmountSelect.Reset"), id))))
128                                         .withClick((click)->click.player().viewer().ifPresent(menuViewer->menuViewer.addData(amtID, BigDecimal.ZERO)))
129                                         .withActions(new SwitchPageAction(menuName, menuPage))
130                                         .withSlot(6)
131                                         .build());
132
133      callback.getPage().addIcon(new IconBuilder(PluginCore.server().stackBuilder().of("STONE_BUTTON", 1)
134                                                         .customName(MessageHandler.grab(new MessageData("Messages.Menu.AmountSelect.Add100"), id)))
135                                         .withActions(new SwitchPageAction(menuName, menuPage))
136                                         .withClick((click)->balAddClick(click, new BigDecimal("100")))
137                                         .withSlot(15)
138                                         .build());
139
140      callback.getPage().addIcon(new IconBuilder(PluginCore.server().stackBuilder().of("STONE_BUTTON", 1)
141                                                         .customName(MessageHandler.grab(new MessageData("Messages.Menu.AmountSelect.Add50"), id)))
142                                         .withActions(new SwitchPageAction(menuName, menuPage))
143                                         .withClick((click)->balAddClick(click, new BigDecimal("50")))
144                                         .withSlot(17)
145                                         .build());
146
147      callback.getPage().addIcon(new IconBuilder(PluginCore.server().stackBuilder().of("STONE_BUTTON", 1)
148                                                         .customName(MessageHandler.grab(new MessageData("Messages.Menu.AmountSelect.Add10"), id)))
149                                         .withActions(new SwitchPageAction(menuName, menuPage))
150                                         .withClick((click)->balAddClick(click, new BigDecimal("10")))
151                                         .withSlot(33)
152                                         .build());
153
154      callback.getPage().addIcon(new IconBuilder(PluginCore.server().stackBuilder().of("STONE_BUTTON", 1)
155                                                         .customName(MessageHandler.grab(new MessageData("Messages.Menu.AmountSelect.Add1"), id)))
156                                         .withActions(new SwitchPageAction(menuName, menuPage))
157                                         .withClick((click)->balAddClick(click, new BigDecimal("1")))
158                                         .withSlot(35)
159                                         .build());
160
161      callback.getPage().addIcon(new IconBuilder(PluginCore.server().stackBuilder().of("STONE_BUTTON", 1)
162                                                         .customName(MessageHandler.grab(new MessageData("Messages.Menu.AmountSelect.AddTenth"), id)))
163                                         .withActions(new SwitchPageAction(menuName, menuPage))
164                                         .withClick((click)->balAddClick(click, new BigDecimal(".10")))
165                                         .withSlot(51)
166                                         .build());
167
168      callback.getPage().addIcon(new IconBuilder(PluginCore.server().stackBuilder().of("STONE_BUTTON", 1)
169                                                         .customName(MessageHandler.grab(new MessageData("Messages.Menu.AmountSelect.AddHundredth"), id)))
170                                         .withActions(new SwitchPageAction(menuName, menuPage))
171                                         .withClick((click)->balAddClick(click, new BigDecimal(".01")))
172                                         .withSlot(53)
173                                         .build());
174
175      callback.getPage().addIcon(new IconBuilder(PluginCore.server().stackBuilder().of("STONE_BUTTON", 1)
176                                                         .customName(MessageHandler.grab(new MessageData("Messages.Menu.AmountSelect.Remove100"), id)))
177                                         .withActions(new SwitchPageAction(menuName, menuPage))
178                                         .withClick((click)->balAddClick(click, new BigDecimal("-100")))
179                                         .withSlot(11)
180                                         .build());
181
182      callback.getPage().addIcon(new IconBuilder(PluginCore.server().stackBuilder().of("STONE_BUTTON", 1)
183                                                         .customName(MessageHandler.grab(new MessageData("Messages.Menu.AmountSelect.Remove50"), id)))
184                                         .withActions(new SwitchPageAction(menuName, menuPage))
185                                         .withClick((click)->balAddClick(click, new BigDecimal("-50")))
186                                         .withSlot(9)
187                                         .build());
188
189      callback.getPage().addIcon(new IconBuilder(PluginCore.server().stackBuilder().of("STONE_BUTTON", 1)
190                                                         .customName(MessageHandler.grab(new MessageData("Messages.Menu.AmountSelect.Remove10"), id)))
191                                         .withActions(new SwitchPageAction(menuName, menuPage))
192                                         .withClick((click)->balAddClick(click, new BigDecimal("-10")))
193                                         .withSlot(29)
194                                         .build());
195
196      callback.getPage().addIcon(new IconBuilder(PluginCore.server().stackBuilder().of("STONE_BUTTON", 1)
197                                                         .customName(MessageHandler.grab(new MessageData("Messages.Menu.AmountSelect.Remove1"), id)))
198                                         .withActions(new SwitchPageAction(menuName, menuPage))
199                                         .withClick((click)->balAddClick(click, new BigDecimal("-1")))
200                                         .withSlot(27)
201                                         .build());
202
203      callback.getPage().addIcon(new IconBuilder(PluginCore.server().stackBuilder().of("STONE_BUTTON", 1)
204                                                         .customName(MessageHandler.grab(new MessageData("Messages.Menu.AmountSelect.RemoveTenth"), id)))
205                                         .withActions(new SwitchPageAction(menuName, menuPage))
206                                         .withClick((click)->balAddClick(click, new BigDecimal("-.10")))
207                                         .withSlot(47)
208                                         .build());
209
210      callback.getPage().addIcon(new IconBuilder(PluginCore.server().stackBuilder().of("STONE_BUTTON", 1)
211                                                         .customName(MessageHandler.grab(new MessageData("Messages.Menu.AmountSelect.RemoveHundredth"), id)))
212                                         .withActions(new SwitchPageAction(menuName, menuPage))
213                                         .withClick((click)->balAddClick(click, new BigDecimal("-.01")))
214                                         .withSlot(45)
215                                         .build());
216    }
217  }
218
219  protected void balAddClick(final MenuClickHandler click, final BigDecimal toAdd) {
220
221    final Optional<MenuViewer> clickViewer = click.player().viewer();
222    clickViewer.ifPresent(menuViewer->addToClickData(menuViewer, toAdd));
223  }
224
225  protected void addToClickData(final MenuViewer viewer, final BigDecimal toAdd) {
226
227    final BigDecimal amt = ((BigDecimal)viewer.dataOrDefault(amtID, BigDecimal.ZERO)).add(toAdd);
228
229    viewer.addData(amtID, amt);
230  }
231}
